website_summaries.verdict: Choose this teeth whitening toothpaste for removing/reducing mild to moderate tooth stains with the possibility of irritation in mind.
pros: Not only is this toothpaste made by a top-selling brand, but it gets rave reviews for its ability to remove stains for leaving a "clean" feeling in the mouth
cons: Contains peroxide, which is known to cause tooth sensitivity and gum irritation in some users and/or with frequent use

customer_reviews.title: I love this toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is usually a great value here. I love this toothpaste because it's a little more gentle and the taste isn't too strong where it feels like it's burning. One of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My regular toothpaste.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased online due to "stay-at-home" suggestion during early period of the coronavirus. When the stores open up again in full swing, I'll most likely purchase locally.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice foaming toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Decent toothpaste. I like a toothpaste that foams, this paste foams well. Makes your mouth feel super clean. Decent taste.
customer_reviews.author: TKG

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I like this Colgate SF Total better than their other Total. The paste is more dense and really foams up well. You can tell it’s effective because it leaves your teeth feeling squeaky clean and your mouth feeling fresh. Works great for sensitivity too!
customer_reviews.author: Curt Betz

customer_reviews.title: Great toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: Great toothpaste, great favor, and great deal for the money! Make you whiter teeth and fresher breath!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Favorite toothpaste in my household. Leaves your mouth feeling fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Country of origin
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know it was made in Mexico but will use it anyway. COO not mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Cushman Codger

customer_reviews.title: Made my tongue burn
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a toothpaste make my tongue hurt the way this did.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good toothpaste, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Colgate one of the old standbys in toothpaste because it works.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Colgate is the brand to trust with your teeth!
customer_reviews.text: Colgate has been used in my family for over 40 years.. I'm proud to smile & show off my cavity free teeth!
customer_reviews.author: hillery garrison

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy brushing my teeth
customer_reviews.text: The mint-flavored toothpaste I used to brush my teeth before was too pungent, which made my gums very sensitive when I brushed my teeth. This time I changed to a new toothpaste, which made my mouth very fresh without the previous stimulation. Now I am enjoying the time of brushing my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna flores

customer_reviews.title: Good value..good toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toothpaste flavor and a great value..cleans very well
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: No safety seal and may have been opened. Tube doesn’t appear to be 100% full.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: No! No! No!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Toothpaste was open and there was no seal on it when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Songbird7

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good. I think the cost-effective products can be recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ayanna  Mathews

customer_reviews.title: It's not to the taste
customer_reviews.text: The taste of toothpaste makes me feel bad. It's against the taste
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: There's not much to say here. It's the Colgate toothpaste to you find anywhere at the store. I just appreciate the convenience of being able to pick it up here online. Always like this flavor, in fact that's the only one I was able to stomach the last several months of pregnancy! I my go-to toothpaste!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: The Best Affordable Whitening Toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: When I tried this toothpaste for the first time, I didn't know what to expect. But, after maybe three weeks I could see a change. Now over a month later, I can see a dramatic change in the color of my teeth. This toothpaste is affordable and it works, but you need to use it consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Oh The Minty Goodness!
customer_reviews.text: I am the rare individual who loves to brush my teeth. This is a wonderful mouth full of minty, foamy frothy goodness that satisfies my longing for a good old fashioned scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: keep it simple

customer_reviews.title: Tooth sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Made my teeth sensitive. I wouldn’t recommend for daily use. Won’t be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Katdelac

customer_reviews.title: Good toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Whitens my teeth but doesn’t irritate my tongue like other whitening brands do. I like that it whitens with peroxide and baking soda.
customer_reviews.author: Prudence Salijoski

product_meta.title: Colgate Baking Soda and Peroxide Whitening Bubbles Toothpaste, Brisk Mint, 8 Ounce
product_meta.description: Refreshes and cleans for whiter teeth.
feature_bullets: Releases pure oxygen bubbles for a clean fresh sensation

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
